channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @avishaiw Did you learn that at NYU Film School?
item.source:markdown: @avishaiw Did you learn that at NYU Film School?

item.description:
@alangblake @joshtpm First, reported income over 500k doesn’t include the people earning 500k but reporting 200k — committing $100k fraud. Each year. So well more than $150k for a multi year audit.

@alangblake @joshtpm Second,are you against all law enforcement, or only those who might catch rich people?
item.source:markdown:
@alangblake @joshtpm First, reported income over 500k doesn’t include the people earning 500k but reporting 200k — committing $100k fraud. Each year. So well more than $150k for a multi year audit.
@alangblake @joshtpm Second,are you against all law enforcement, or only those who might catch rich people?

item.description: @alangblake @joshtpm You’re saying an IRS agent can’t find $150k/year if unleashed? Surely you’re joking. And at odds with all that is known and suspected about tax fraud.
item.source:markdown: @alangblake @joshtpm You’re saying an IRS agent can’t find $150k/year if unleashed? Surely you’re joking. And at odds with all that is known and suspected about tax fraud.

item.description: @alangblake @joshtpm Plenty of dudes putting $8000 Manhattan rent and upscale groceries on their LLC’s corporate card and only reporting the remainder to the IRS and their ex-wives.
item.source:markdown: @alangblake @joshtpm Plenty of dudes putting $8000 Manhattan rent and upscale groceries on their LLC’s corporate card and only reporting the remainder to the IRS and their ex-wives.

item.description: Get yourself a physician not in the pay of Big Pancreas. https://t.co/W3JIoKtdv0
item.source:markdown: Get yourself a physician not in the pay of Big Pancreas. https://t.co/W3JIoKtdv0

item.description: @delong @CaraGuha @Popehat Since part of his job is not saying the quiet part aloud, it would seem to be defamatory. Absent the tweet being rebroadcast to a bigger audience, it’s hard to imagine any actual damages. (And that’s putting aside the satirical commentary defense.)
item.source:markdown: @delong @CaraGuha @Popehat Since part of his job is not saying the quiet part aloud, it would seem to be defamatory. Absent the tweet being rebroadcast to a bigger audience, it’s hard to imagine any actual damages. (And that’s putting aside the satirical commentary defense.)

item.description: @MisfitTorah Isn’t that the subtext of all the We Love Shabbos songs?
item.source:markdown: @MisfitTorah Isn’t that the subtext of all the We Love Shabbos songs?

item.description: @EladNehorai To be fair, Kahane, who in the 80s offered the best English-language articulation of Settler theology, did look to Nazi Nuremberg laws in the legislation he introduced in the Knesset.
item.source:markdown: @EladNehorai To be fair, Kahane, who in the 80s offered the best English-language articulation of Settler theology, did look to Nazi Nuremberg laws in the legislation he introduced in the Knesset.

item.description:
It would have been more honest to also note the role of Republican Senator Rand Paul in blocking quick Senate approval of the funding. https://t.co/AO05hcXMDr

You’d think the Paul family would be on the radar of an ostensible antisemitism fighting group, given that a New Jersey kid returned from volunteering on Ron Paul’s 2012 New Hampshire campaign a determined antisemite and went on to orchestrate attacks on local synagogues.
item.source:markdown:

item.description: “That AIPAC’s wins in these Democratic primaries have been partially funded by multi-million dollar contributions from Republican billionaires has further embittered many activists, particularly those working for candidates where Israel did not even arise as an issue.” https://t.co/x6CdemV9FR
item.source:markdown: “That AIPAC’s wins in these Democratic primaries have been partially funded by multi-million dollar contributions from Republican billionaires has further embittered many activists, particularly those working for candidates where Israel did not even arise as an issue.” https://t.co/x6CdemV9FR

item.description: @trekonomics Here’s hoping Old Zealand’s surprise victory in its centuries-long campaign against its Pacific upstart doesn’t give Old York any ideas.
item.source:markdown: @trekonomics Here’s hoping Old Zealand’s surprise victory in its centuries-long campaign against its Pacific upstart doesn’t give Old York any ideas.

item.description:
Props to @TachyonPub for their awesome social media campaign promoting @lavietidhar’s upcoming novel about a futuristic city in the Saudi desert. https://t.co/5Lmp2okE1c

Here’s hoping it pays off and they can afford to publish his Maror, just published in the UK, a country best known until now for criminalizing Jewish immigration to Palestine.

Anyway, preorder Neom today. https://t.co/nEkciOdyQy
item.source:markdown:
Props to @TachyonPub for their awesome social media campaign promoting @lavietidhar’s upcoming novel about a futuristic city in the Saudi desert. https://t.co/5Lmp2okE1c
Here’s hoping it pays off and they can afford to publish his Maror, just published in the UK, a country best known until now for criminalizing Jewish immigration to Palestine.
Anyway, preorder Neom today. https://t.co/nEkciOdyQy

item.description: @tompeyer Oh sure, who doesn’t enjoy seeing our childhood heroes dying of plague?

item.description: @EladNehorai A cheaper way to pander to the frum vote than subsidizing yeshiva education.

item.description:
@trekonomics Because they were thought to be barbarians by the Canadians.

@trekonomics Never forget that holding the moral high ground seldom correlates with being the last one standing above ground.
item.source:markdown:
@trekonomics Because they were thought to be barbarians by the Canadians.

item.description: @scalzi Okay. Putting you down for a possible consulting editor gig if I ever win the Powerball.

item.description: @AkivaMCohen On the other hand, he can put “America’s Top Christian Nationalist” — Twitter Inc on the front of his next book. None of the authors In working on publicity for can boast a billion dollar corporation calling them “top” in their field.
item.source:markdown: @AkivaMCohen On the other hand, he can put “America’s Top Christian Nationalist” — Twitter Inc on the front of his next book. None of the authors In working on publicity for can boast a billion dollar corporation calling them “top” in their field.

item.description: @scalzi Assuming you had sold a billion copies of each of your novels and therefore were able to swing the purchase price, would you go for it?
item.source:markdown: @scalzi Assuming you had sold a billion copies of each of your novels and therefore were able to swing the purchase price, would you go for it?

item.description: “When we walked into the classroom on that first week of September, we noticed the single ditto sheets on the tops of each of our desks as Joe Fili, senior English teacher, told us to sit down and read the words we saw printed.” https://t.co/YGlWlJ6mY0
item.source:markdown: “When we walked into the classroom on that first week of September, we noticed the single ditto sheets on the tops of each of our desks as Joe Fili, senior English teacher, told us to sit down and read the words we saw printed.” https://t.co/YGlWlJ6mY0
